com.cigital.insecurepay.common

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.DBHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityHistoryDBHelper, LoginDBHelper

    public class DBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    DBHelper is a class that extends SQLiteOpenHelper. This class creates local Database 'InsecurePayDB' and two tables 'LoginTrials' and 'Transfers'. LoginTrials maintains the number of login attempts and account lockout status Transfers table is used to dump all the transaction details when ActivityHistory is checked.
